== rest/services/radar ==
Input
{{{
// some credentials or some sort of api_key?
}}}

Output
{{{
{
    "brands": {
        "brand" : [
            {
                "id"            : "id",
                "title"         : "title",
                "icon"          : "icon",
                "description"   : "description"
            }   
        ]
    },

    "pubs": {
        "pub" : [
            {
                "id"            : "id",
                "title"         : "title"
                "longitude"     : "longitude",
                "latitude"      : "latitude",
                "address"       : "address",
                "notes"         : "notes",
                "phone"         : "phone",
                "url"           : "url",
                "description"   : "description"
            }   
        ]
    },

    "brands<->pubs": {
        "item" : [
            {
                "brand"         : "id",
                "pub"           : "id"
            }   
        ]
    },

    "countries": {
        "country" : [
            {
                "id"            : "id",
                "name"          : "name"
            }   
        ]
    },

    "brands->countries": {
        "item" : [
            {
                "brand"         : "id",
                "country"       : "id"
            }   
        ]
    },

    "tags": {
            "tag" : [
            {
                "id"            : "id",
                "name"          : "name"
            }   
        ]
    },

    "brands->tags": {
        "item" : [
            {
                "brand"         : "id",
                "tag"           : "id"
            }   
        ]
    },
    
    "quotes": {
        "quote" : [
            {
                "index"         : "index",
                "text"          : "text"
            }   
        ]
    },
}
